import React from 'react' const Hero = (filters) => { console.log('filters:', filters) const {dateFrom, dateTo, country, price, rooms} = filters const countryText = country ? `en ${country}` : '' const priceText = price ? `por $${price}`: '' const roomsText = rooms ? `de hasta $${rooms} habitaciones`: '' const dateToFormated = dateFrom.format('dddd[,] D [de] MMM [de] YYY') const dateFromFormated = dateTo.format('dddd[,] D [de] MMM [de] YYY') return (

Hoteles

desde el {dateToParsed} hasta el {dateTo} {countryText} {priceText} {roomsText}.

) } export default Hero
